articles.description: One-time payment will be made in January as calls for industrial action grow.
articles.content:
144 with 78 posters participating
In a quarter in which its revenues are expected to surpass $100 billion for the first time, Amazon says it will spend $500 million on a one-time Christmas bonus for… [+3968 chars]

articles.author: Swati Gupta and Hanna Ziady, CNN Business
articles.title: India suffers first recession in decades - CNN
articles.description: India has plunged into recession for the first time in nearly a quarter of a century as the pandemic continues to weigh heavily on Asia's third biggest economy, which economists warn will struggle to recover from the slump.
